attributes.action: Respect the majority will of the UK and uphold and preserve their Democracy.
attributes.additional_details: This is solely in response to the petition of William Oliver Healey that is calling for a second referendum to take place. Please sign in respect of democracy.
attributes.background: We respectfully request that any protests and petitions that attempt to undermine and compromise the result of a fair, democratic and Just EU Referendum are not considered for debate. We believe that said results are the only fair reflection of the will of the UK and must be categorically upheld.
